properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 5:18PM PST until January 8 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...West to northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts to 30 kt.
Seas 10 to 12 feet at 12 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out
10 NM.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY
